title: "Sideways"-loving wine enthusiasts should generally be punched in the mouth
body: <p>I'm kidding of course, but there's nothing worse than a wine-snob wanna-be putting down <a href="http://beercraft.blogspot.com/2006/08/beer-is-alive-and-well.html">the most delicious beverage in existence</a>. I don't know why so many people love to hate on beer. Do they think it makes them sound <a href="http://www.brookston.org/beer/?p=341">more intelligent</a>? I realize that it isn't just wine snobs picking on beer, but I'm really tired of going out to eat and seeing <a href="http://beercraft.blogspot.com/2006/07/happy-anniversary-to-me-and-gripe.html">ridiculous wine lists, wine recommendations, wine-food pairings, wine specials</a>, only to find out the place's beer selection is worse than a gas station. </p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2006-08-08

"Sideways"-loving wine enthusiasts should generally be punched in the mouth

I'm kidding of course, but there's nothing worse than a wine-snob wanna-be putting down
